description.value: Shadow nerves are long strands of partially incorporeal undead nerve fibers that have strong connections to the Shadow Plane, allowing you to navigate a path that exists partially in the Material Plane and partially in the Shadow Plane. A number of times per day equal to the necrograft’s mark, you can take a guarded step of 10 feet, rather than the usual 5-foot guarded step (Core Rulebook 247), as long as you are not in an area of bright light.
